mapper.select: select a.is_read as isRead, b.id as reportId, b.reporter_name as reporterName, c.head_img_url as reporterHeadUrl, d.dpt_name as reportSourceName, 0 as reportSourceType from t_report_user a left join t_report b on a.report_id=b.id left join sys_user c on b.reporter_id=c.id left join sys_dept d on b.reporter_dpt_id=d.id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.is_read=0

SELECT report.* FROM t_report report INNER JOIN t_report_user reportUser ON reportUser.report_id = report.id AND reportUser.user_id = #{userId} AND str_to_date(report.create_time,'%Y-%m') =str_to_date(#{month},'%Y-%m') ORDER BY report.create_time DESC

SELECT report.id, report.shop_name, report.reporter_name, report.form_type, report.reporter_dpt_name, report.create_time, reportUser.id AS report_user_id, reportUser.is_read, reportUser.user_id, user.head_img_url FROM t_report report INNER JOIN t_report_user reportUser ON reportUser.report_id = report.id AND reportUser.user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN sys_user user ON user.id = report.reporter_id ORDER BY reportUser.is_read ASC, report.create_time DESC

select count(b.id) from t_report_user a left join t_report b on a.report_id=b.id left join sys_user c on b.reporter_id=c.id left join sys_dept d on b.reporter_dpt_id=d.id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.is_read=0

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO t_report ( shop_name, shop_id, shopkeeper_name, shopkeeper_id, reporter_id, reporter_name, reporter_dpt_id, reporter_dpt_name, reporter_position_id, reporter_position, form_result_id, form_type, org_id, check_form_time, create_time, create_user_id )VALUES ( #{shopName}, #{shopId}, #{shopkeeperName}, #{shopkeeperId}, #{reporterId}, #{reporterName}, #{reporterDptId}, #{reporterDptName}, #{reporterPositionId}, #{reporterPosition}, #{formResultId}, #{formType}, #{orgId}, #{checkFormTime}, #{createTime}, #{createUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT report.id, report.shop_id, report.shop_name, report.reporter_position, report.reporter_name, report.form_result_id, report.create_time FROM t_report report INNER JOIN t_form_check_result result ON result.id = report.form_result_id AND result.form_main_id = #{formId} WHERE report.create_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY report.create_time ASC

select t1.id as reportId,t1.reporter_name as reporterName ,t1.check_form_time as checkFormTime, t2.score_rate as scoreRate,t2.form_main_name as formName,t2.form_main_id as formId, count(t3.id) as opptNum from t_report t1 left join t_form_check_result t2 on t1.form_result_id=t2.id left join t_report_oppt t3 on t1.id=t3.report_id where t1.shop_id=#{shopId} and t1.reporter_dpt_id=#{dptId}
and str_to_date(#{startMonth},'%Y-%m') <= str_to_date(t1.check_form_time,'%Y-%m')
and str_to_date(t1.check_form_time,'%Y-%m') <= str_to_date(#{endMonth},'%Y-%m')
and t2.form_main_id=#{formId} group by t1.id order by t1.check_form_time desc
